pr_title: Check to see if injection point is same as current thread local value

timeline.bodyText: You could move that one outside of the else and call InjectionPointProvider.CURRENT.get() only once in all cases. Or do I miss something?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Good point, I will update the PR
replies.author: johnaohara
